column2:
"It's all becoming clear now. This latest request...
And that captivatingly sweet song of the Rappyâ€¦"

"That's right. My true calling is singing! I'm going
to quit ARKS and become a singer!"

"And I'm not talking about those silly idols
that are so trendy right now. I'm going beyond
that and straight to the top. Just you wait and see!"

"But don't worry, I'll give you a mention in my
memoir, once I make it up there. After
all, you did help me find my calling."

"I better get to work if I want to reach the top.
Well, I guess this is good-bye. The next time
you'll see me I'll be on a monitor near you!"
